name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Anna ADAMETZ, Appellant; COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Paul S. ADAMETZ, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., who was sitting by designation, did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Anna ADAMETZ, Appellant. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Paul S. ADAMETZ, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MONTEMURO, J., who was sitting by designation, did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Irving M. Green, Kensington, for Anna Adametz.
John W. Peck and Allen P. Powanda, Greensberg, for the Commonwealth.
Nadia L. Vargo and Stanley J. WolowsM, for AmicusPolice.
casebody.head_matter:
669 A.2d 952
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Anna ADAMETZ, Appellant. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Paul S. ADAMETZ, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 20, 1995.
Decided Jan. 18, 1996.
Irving M. Green, Kensington, for Anna Adametz.
John W. Peck and Allen P. Powanda, Greensberg, for the Commonwealth.
Nadia L. Vargo and Stanley J. WolowsM, for AmicusPolice.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
Application For Leave For Amicus Curiae To Present Oral Argument filed.
